typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movieId as short,
		title as string,
		genres as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> MoviesSource
MoviesSource derive(Year = toInteger(trim(right(title, 6), '()')),
		Title = toString(left(title, length(title)-6))) ~> YearExtraction
YearExtraction select(mapColumn(
		movieId,
		genres,
		Year,
		Title
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RemoveColumnsTitle
RemoveColumnsTitle aggregate(groupBy(Year),
	MoviesCount = count()) ~> MovieCountByYear
RemoveColumnsTitle sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['MoviesClean.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MoviesCleanSink
MovieCountByYear sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['movies-by-year.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> MovieCountSink
